member.name: M:AStar.ASPNet.Extensions.ServiceCollectionExtensions.ServiceCollectionExtensions.ConfigureUi(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)

member.param: An instance of the interface that will be configured with the the Global Exception Handler, and the controllers (a UI isn't much use without them...).
member.returns: The original to facilitate method chaining.

member.param: An instance of the interface that will be configured with the current methods.
member.returns: The original to facilitate method chaining.

The name of the API to use in the Swagger UI.
